title: 111_s3212
content: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a 30 energy tax credit for qualified energy efficiency property. Defines qualified energy efficiency property as property which: (1) is residential rental property, nonresidential real property, or mixed use real property, (2) is a qualified building as defined by this Act. And (3) achieves a specified energy savings. Amends the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act to allow grants for investment in qualified energy efficiency property in lieu of tax credits.
